column4: hi for all.. anyone knows a software on ubuntu that scan for wifi signal?

if you have a working wifi nic, its should already be installed
ok.. yes, its already installed
see phar0z comments
you cant scan wifi with a wire connection.. lolz
of course
without a wifi nic card, impossible
is it in your hand and not plugged-in? hehehe
wlan0 here or wmaster
we gave you the commands to work with, please scroll up
I saw it.. but wich interface?
i already told you, try each one, if it gives you error, try the next
sure
dont be afraid to try each interface, you'll learn from it

then you maybe in an enclosed can where wifi signals can not get to you..
